casebody.data:
KRAWIEC, et al.
v.
MANLY, et al. 252A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2016 Nichole M. Hatcher, Attorney at Law, Erin B. Blackwell, Attorney at Law, for Krawiec, Michael et al. Renner Jo St. John, Attorney at Law, for Bogosavac, Ranko, et al. H. M. Whitesides, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Manly, Jim, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of December 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 13th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
